description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in JS Help Desk JS Help Desk – Best Help Desk & Support Plugin allows Stored XSS.This issue affects JS Help Desk – Best Help Desk & Support Plugin: from n/a through 2.8.7.

product.name: JS Help Desk – Best Help Desk & Support Plugin
